select count(*) from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r,cmt c where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and e.emp_num = c.emp_num and to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchStart} and #{searchEnd}>=to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') and e.emp_name = #{searchName} order by to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, e.dep_num,e.rnk_num

select a.* from (select e.emp_num as emp_num, e.emp_name as emp_name, e.emp_hiredate as emp_hiredate,d.content as dcontent,t.content as tcontent,r.content as rcontent from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code order by e.dep_num,e.rnk_num) a left outer join (select e.emp_num as emp_num, e.emp_name as emp_name, e.emp_hiredate as emp_hiredate,d.content as dcontent,t.content as tcontent,r.content as rcontent, to_char(c.cmt_srt,'HH24:MI') as srttime, to_char(c.cmt_end,'HH24:MI') as endtime, to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as cmt_date from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r,cmt c where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and e.emp_num = c.emp_num and to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{absent}) b on a.emp_num = b.emp_num where b.emp_num is null
